EmailTemplate.name: NO CONTENTS IN EMAIL QUERY/MISSING DETAIL
EmailTemplate.subject: NO CONTENTS IN EMAIL QUERY/MISSING DETAIL
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NO CONTENTS IN EMAIL QUERY/MISSING DETAIL Good day{!Case.Email_Sender_Name__c} Thank you for your email. Unfortunately the email we received contains no message/not the required account number/s/incomplete information regarding the transaction you are enquiring about. Please resend the email with the outstanding details in order for us to action your request. I trust that you find the above in order. Kind regards {!User.Name} | Service Consultant | Phone:{!User.CSC_Phone__c} Address: 1st Floor, Block B | Barclays Pretoria Campus | 270 Maggs Str | Waltloo | Pretoria
Please consider your environmental responsibility before printing this e-mail. COMPANY CONFIDENTIAL This mail and any attachments are confidential, privileged and for internal use within Absa Bank Limited/Barclays Africa Group Limited only, unless otherwise expressly provided. The contents may not be copied, disclosed and/or distributed to any other person and may only be used for the purpose of the matter to which it relates and the person to whom it is addressed.
